name: parsimonious
description: Utilities for Parse Server cloud code and JS SDK

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile; npm run docs; git add .; git commit -m 'prepublishOnly'; git push origin master;
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --template docs/README.hbs --files ./src/index.js --param-list-format list > docs/README.1; cat docs/CHANGELOG.md >> docs/README.1; npm run after-jsdoc2md
scripts.after-jsdoc2md: shx sed 's/### new Parsimonious\(\)//' docs/README.1 > docs/README.2; shx sed 's/\* \[new Parsimonious\(\)\]\(#new_Parsimonious_new\)//' docs/README.2 > README.md; shx rm -rf docs/README.1 docs/README.2
